implementation_output.changes_summary: Created complete Pydantic v2 model definitions for all 11 MCP tools. Implemented request models in requests.py (168 lines) with AsyncReadRequest, AsyncWriteRequest, AsyncUpdateRequest, AsyncDeleteRequest, AsyncRenameRequest, AsyncAppendRequest, AsyncListRequest, AsyncStatusRequest, AsyncBatchReadRequest, AsyncBatchWriteRequest, AsyncBatchUpdateRequest, plus supporting models Patch, BatchReadItem, BatchWriteItem, BatchUpdateItem. Implemented response models in responses.py (330 lines) with success responses (ReadSuccessResponse, WriteSuccessResponse, UpdateSuccessResponse, DeleteSuccessResponse, RenameSuccessResponse, AppendSuccessResponse, ListSuccessResponse), ErrorResponse with ErrorCode enum, ContentionResponse with diff models (DiffChange, DiffSummary, JsonDiff, UnifiedDiff, PatchConflict), status responses (GlobalStatusResponse, FileStatusResponse with ServerInfo, ActiveLocks, PendingRequest), batch responses (BatchReadResponse, BatchWriteResponse, BatchUpdateResponse with BatchSummary), and DirectoryEntry. Updated __init__.py (91 lines) to re-export all 44 public models. Added @model_validator decorators to AsyncUpdateRequest and BatchUpdateItem enforcing mutually exclusive content/patches constraint. All models use Pydantic v2 with strict typing, frozen=True for responses, discriminated unions for diff formats.
